ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LINDY LEDOHOWSKI of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
